isis.stitle: TSI 93-08-02 - Cummins CELECT Engine Fault Code 434

geninfo.para: This TSI applies to all models with Cummins L10 and N14 engines with CELECT.

There have been some reports that the ECM on Cummins L10 and N14 engines has been registering a fault code 434 when the engine is started. This may be due to the ECM being wired directly to the starting motor terminal rather than the battery.
When troubleshooting for a fault code 434, make sure all the basic items are checked, such as:
If the above items check okay, rewire the unswitched 12 volt ECM input directly to the batteries.
